mapper.select: select count(t.id) from pt_fi_account_set_company t where t.delflag=0 and t.account_set_id=#{accountSetId}

select t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.create_date as createDate, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.delflag, t.id, t.tend_id as tendId, t.update_date as updateDate, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName, t.account_set_id as accountSetId, t.companyId, t.company_name as companyName, t.payment_organ_id as paymentOrganId, t.payment_organ_name as paymentOrganName, t.project_branch_id as projectBranchId, t.project_branch_name as projectBranchName from pt_fi_account_set_company t where t.delflag=0 and t.account_set_id=#{accountSetId}
limit #{start},#{limit}
